@Mendorphins wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Major RuneScape Account Hack Warning [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:74, topic:383413”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=479192.msg3510992#msg3510992 date=1298571048]
Oh my goddddd, PEOPLE FROM R-S DONT KNOW SHIT.
[/quote]
I know that, lol.

[quote author=Python_ link=topic=479192.msg3510992#msg3510992 date=1298571048]These are all words from Jacmob/Paris/Arbi. THEMSELVES. All this information is coming straight from; Powerbot/Rsbot.net/Autofighter/ Hackforums, were Arbi. admitted about StealthBot, and StealthBot being inactive.
[/quote]
Very well, but the whole point of this topic is because of the code in the clients and servers. Whether it came from HF or RSBot originally, what I am trying to say is some people keep putting forward that the malicious code is in RSBot.Jar, which in this case that I’m explaining it is not.

In other words, I’m not investigating/showing when the malicious material came from, I’m warning where it possibly could be now, and it seems like a few people have been caught out from client/server downloads.[/quote]

It’s the users fault if they download a server, or client, that has some malicious code inside. Everyone that downloads a server off of any RuneScape Private Server forums, should know the risk they are taking. If the user is not smart enough to check through the core java files that a virus or malicious code could be built inside of, than that is the user(s) fault.

People need to know the risk they are taking. There has been way to many people posting ways to avoid a virus and what not, frankly is the people are too stupid to read over the regulations that each person post(s), that is - like I said - the users own fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Major RuneScape Account Hack Warning [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Python_:

Oh my goddddd, PEOPLE FROM R-S DONT KNOW SHIT.

I know that, lol.

Python_:

These are all words from Jacmob/Paris/Arbi. THEMSELVES. All this information is coming straight from; Powerbot/Rsbot.net/Autofighter/ Hackforums, were Arbi. admitted about StealthBot, and StealthBot being inactive.

Very well, but the whole point of this topic is because of the code in the clients and servers. Whether it came from HF or RSBot originally, what I am trying to say is some people keep putting forward that the malicious code is in RSBot.Jar, which in this case that I’m explaining it is not.

In other words, I’m not investigating/showing when the malicious material came from, I’m warning where it possibly could be now, and it seems like a few people have been caught out from client/server downloads.

Read full topic

item.title: Major RuneScape Account Hack Warning [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:72, topic:383413”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=479192.msg3510936#msg3510936 date=1298560609]

Quit fucking over reacting, go read my thread… You guys are flipping out, this kid just deleted viruses that were already in his computer. Powerbot/rsbot/Arabi Scripts, didn’t cause this. My god.

1: I’m not a kid.
2: It’s not a virus, as such.
3: Learn to read. I’m not saying PowerBot is the root cause, I’m fed up of people coming along and thinking they can put me straight, well let me put you straight - you download a client/server; it contains malicious Java files; when you execute the server there is malicious code executed too via the Main classes; you log on to PowerBot; and it grabs your information!

IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH POWERBOT DIRECTLY! OMFG! I got smart arses on R-S now I’ve got a smart arse here…

StealthBot, which was what the rat is called, is what stole all you’re information. Btw, it’s disabled and no longer active. Delete everything on this thread, and post: “Change you’re password, StealthBot is inactive.”
[/quote]
No. What makes you think you’re right, when I’ve had people from R-S saying something completely different.

I’ve tested this and this is what it is. Yours is something completely different, so make you own thread if you want.

I stand by what I’ve wrote. If you want an even more thorough explanation I’ll write a whole 20,000 character post if I have to.

Check this for instance:

LOL. What “fix” are you talking about?
A fix on how to delete some .dll assemblies that belong to microsoft and are on everyone’s computer, after posting some piece of code that can be found in every client/server which according to you is “virus”?

LOL. Someone please post over there and back me up I’m about to lose my mind. They seem to think it’s either PowerBot itself or a scam in RuneScape… No one has grasped the fact I’m explaining about clients/server we download everyday in the Server Download Section. ARGHH![/quote]

Oh my goddddd, PEOPLE FROM R-S DONT KNOW SHIT. These are all words from Jacmob/Paris/Arbi. THEMSELVES. All this information is coming straight from; Powerbot/Rsbot.net/Autofighter/ Hackforums, were Arbi. admitted about StealthBot, and StealthBot being inactive.

Read full topic

item.title: Major RuneScape Account Hack Warning [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Python_, post:71, topic:383413”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=479192.msg3510903#msg3510903 date=1298556252]

Quit fucking over reacting, go read my thread… You guys are flipping out, this kid just deleted viruses that were already in his computer. Powerbot/rsbot/Arabi Scripts, didn’t cause this. My god.

1: I’m not a kid.
2: It’s not a virus, as such.
3: Learn to read. I’m not saying PowerBot is the root cause, I’m fed up of people coming along and thinking they can put me straight, well let me put you straight - you download a client/server; it contains malicious Java files; when you execute the server there is malicious code executed too via the Main classes; you log on to PowerBot; and it grabs your information!

IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH POWERBOT DIRECTLY! OMFG! I got smart arses on R-S now I’ve got a smart arse here…
[/quote]

StealthBot, which was what the rat is called, is what stole all you’re information. Btw, it’s disabled and no longer active. Delete everything on this thread, and post: “Change you’re password, StealthBot is inactive.”[/quote]
No. What makes you think you’re right, when I’ve had people from R-S saying something completely different.

I’ve tested this and this is what it is. Yours is something completely different, so make you own thread if you want.

I stand by what I’ve wrote. If you want an even more thorough explanation I’ll write a whole 20,000 character post if I have to.

Check this for instance:

[quote=“Sirwankalot @ R-S”]LOL. What “fix” are you talking about?
A fix on how to delete some .dll assemblies that belong to microsoft and are on everyone’s computer, after posting some piece of code that can be found in every client/server which according to you is “virus”?[/quote]
LOL. Someone please post over there and back me up I’m about to lose my mind. They seem to think it’s either PowerBot itself or a scam in RuneScape… No one has grasped the fact I’m explaining about clients/server we download everyday in the Server Download Section. ARGHH!

Read full topic

item.title: Major RuneScape Account Hack Warning [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:69, topic:383413”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=479192.msg3510681#msg3510681 date=1298523547]
Quit fucking over reacting, go read my thread… You guys are flipping out, this kid just deleted viruses that were already in his computer. Powerbot/rsbot/Arabi Scripts, didn’t cause this. My god.
[/quote]

I’m not saying PowerBot is the root cause, I’m fed up of people coming along and thinking they can put me straight, well let me put you straight - you download a client/server; it contains malicious Java files; when you execute the server there is malicious code executed too via the Main classes; you log on to PowerBot; and it grabs your information!

IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH POWERBOT DIRECTLY! OMFG! I got smart arses on R-S now I’ve got a smart arse here…[/quote]

StealthBot, which was what the rat is called, is what stole all you’re information. Btw, it’s disabled and no longer active. Delete everything on this thread, and post: “Change you’re password, StealthBot is inactive.”
